lexUnit.name: paint.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: apply a substance which is spread over a surface and dries to leave a thin decorative or protective coating.

sentence.text: The ceiling was painted a dark maroon , with tiny pin-points of light set here and there in the plaster to glow like stars in the night sky .

The ceiling was painted by Professor Gerald Moira .
